Package: com.aestasit.infrastructure.winrm.dsl

[Groovy] Class FileSetDelegate

    • com.aestasit.infrastructure.winrm.dsl.FileSetDelegate

    • Closure delegate that is used to collect data about remote or local file collection.

      Authors:
      Andrey Adamovich
